Key Arguments: The bill infringes on freedom of speech, a fundamental human right.
The bill infringes on democracy, where freedom of speech is a cornerstone.
There is skepticism about who decides what constitutes disinformation and who fact-checks the fact-checkers.
The bill exempts the government and mainstream media, which is seen as unfair.
The bill is compared to oppressive measures used by communist countries.
Notable Quotes: Infringement of FREEDOM OF SPEECH which is a fundamental Human Right
Any Bill that infringes on the Democratic Right to Freedom of Speech is a form of tyranny used by Communist countries to oppress their citizens.
